# GSS Data Exploration

## Data Cleaning

```{r}
indx <- sapply(dat, is.character)
dat[indx] <- lapply(dat[indx], function(x) as.factor(as.character(x)))
names(dat) <- c('year', 'happiness', 'party', 'residence', 'sex', 'education', 'children', 'marriage', 'id', 'ballot')
str(dat)
```
